title: Project Initiation
description: Kickoff the project, gather requirements, and define the project scope and objectives.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flows, and data models. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Define the roles and responsibilities of each component, as well as the communication protocols and data formats. In addition, outline the strategies for integrating various urban systems such as traffic management, waste collection, and public safety using IoT devices and centralized data analytics.

title: IoT Device Integration: Update and Improvements Proposal - Revised
description: This RFC proposes the updated requirements and protocols for integrating IoT devices from various urban systems. The focus remains on ensuring compatibility, security, scalability, and now includes energy efficiency and data privacy considerations in the integration process.

title: User Interface Design for SmartCityOrchestrator
description:
Design a responsive, intuitive, and accessible user interface for monitoring and controlling the integrated urban systems. The UI should provide a centralized dashboard with real-time data visualization, alerts, and control mechanisms. Consider usability, security, and accessibility best practices. Collaborate with frontend-developer to ensure seamless implementation of the design.

Dependencies: System Architecture Design, Data Visualization Requirements

Additional Notes: Ensure the UI is scalable and can handle large amounts of data effectively.

title: Security and Compliance for SmartCityOrchestrator
description: Define comprehensive security requirements, data privacy policies, and compliance standards for the SmartCityOrchestrator system. Include a detailed analysis of potential risks, proposed mitigation strategies, and ongoing monitoring procedures. Consider integration with existing IT infrastructure and adherence to industry-standard best practices.

title: Infrastructure and Deployment Planning
description: Plan the infrastructure requirements, deployment strategies, and monitoring tools for the SmartCityOrchestrator system. This includes detailing hardware, software, network, and security considerations for a robust, scalable, and secure city-wide IoT deployment. Consider edge computing for real-time data processing and ensure compatibility with existing urban systems.
